message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm sure you'll find it very useful. I'm offering it to you for $110.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for offering! $110 seems a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $65?
Bob, I understand your position.  $65 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $85?  I'm confident you'll find this a good deal.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we split the difference between our last offers and settle at $75?
